message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to enhance your daily life and productivity. I believe its value exceeds $80, but I'll start with a special introductory offer just for you. Would you like to purchase it for $95?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $82.50?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to make a counteroffer. Given the value I place on this product, I propose a price of $85. Can we agree on this?
Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Would you be willing to go down to $80?
